citations.narrative:
The facility has acquired tags and collars for official identification, however the dogs are not wearing their official
identification. Official identification is required and can be important for husbandry and health tracking of animals. Ensure
dogs are wearing their official identification as required.
Correct by September 8, 2023.

The facility has APHIS 7005 completed, however it has not been updated with official identification numbers for each dog.
Official identification is required to be recorded on APHIS 7005 and can be important for husbandry tracking. Ensure to
update APHIS 7005 with the assigned identifications numbers for each dog.
Correct by September 8, 2023.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
n
